physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It does not have a frame and its sides are whitened out. A man in uniforms can be seen on the right hand side of the image. He is using a long metal tool and is bending to the left and applying some force to it. A large portion of the photograph is taken up by the head of a locomotive. It is stationed at a railway turntable. The number ""6423"" is displayed at the front of the locomotive
